name: IMPALE YOUR FRIENDS!
description:
IMPALE YOUR FRIENDS! is a lightning fast, 4-player, couch multiplayer game about throwing spikes to do... well... it's in the title! Combat is simple to learn, difficult to master, and brutally intense.

Keyboard and mouse is supported, but using a controller is the optimal way to play.

Features:
  • Deathmatch and survival game modes
  • AI bots to play against (though playing against friends you can shove off the couch is always recommended)
  • 20 levels
  • Full level editor
